text: Jetsun Lobsang Tenzin Rinpoche (1937 – 21 April 2017) was the 103rd Ganden Tripa (spiritual leader) of the Gelug school of Tibetan Buddhism. He was appointed to the position by the Dalai Lama in 2016 and died in 2017. == References == Category:1937 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Ganden Tripas Category:Gelug Lamas Category:Lamas from Tibet
title: Jetsun Lobsang Tenzin
